events.message: I received my order yesterday but the wrong item was sent. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The reported case has been categorized under the Refund cluster due to customer requesting a refund for the wrong item received.
Assigned support agent to handle the refund request for the customer who received an incorrect order.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I'll assist you with the return and refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and proceed with your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached a picture showing the wrong item that arrived instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the return shipping label to your email right away and process your refund once the item is received.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response. I'll send the item back as soon as I get the label.
Your return has been received and your refund has been processed. You should see the amount credited to your account within 3-5 business days.
Checking in to make sure you have received your refund and if there's anything else we can assist you with.
As your refund was successful and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us!
